eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 09:06 PM ON OCT 15, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:12 AM OCT 16, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Safe Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. The Phoenix Police Department is looking for 62 year old Barbara Bennett Byrne. Barbara is a white female, 5 feet 6 inches tall, 145 pounds with grey hair and blue eyes. Unknown clothing description. Barbara was last seen on 10/9/2025 on foot in the area of North 3rd Street and East Dunlap Avenue. Barbara suffers from a medical condition which may cause her to become lost or easily confused. Please contact Phoenix Police at 602 262 6151 or call 911 with any information. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
